Class OrderFileProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dds.appcode.OrderFileProcessor

  • public class OrderFileProcessor
extends Object
    OrderFileProcessor.java - Purpose of this class is to read the input file, validate its contents and process it.
    Version:
    1.0 *
    Author:
    Mahak Malik

    • Method Detail

      • bufferedReaderToArrayList

        public void bufferedReaderToArrayList(String path)
                               throws FileNotFoundException,
                                      MalformedFileDataException,
                                      ListEmptyException
        Process the orders file provided as input, call checkTheValidityOfTheEntry() and createOrderList()
        Parameters:
        path - - Input file path.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - - If the file is not found at the provided path
        MalformedFileDataException - - If the file contains malformed data
        ListEmptyException - - If any of the list is empty.

      • createOrderList

        public void createOrderList(String orderId,
                            String deliveryLocation,
                            LocalTime orderPlaceTime)
        Create an ArrayList custOrderDetails with objects of class OrderDetails.
        Parameters:
        orderId - - unique order ID for each order
        deliveryLocation - - location where order needs to be delivered
        orderPlaceTime - - time at which the order was placed
        See Also:
        OrderDetails

      • sortList

        public void sortList(ArrayList<OrderDetails> custOrderDetails)
              throws ListEmptyException
        Sort the custOrderDetails list according to the round trip time from warehouse to delivery location.
        Parameters:
        custOrderDetails - - list of OrderDetails objects
        Throws:
        ListEmptyException - - If custOrderDetails list is empty

      • checkTheValidityOfTheEntry

        public boolean checkTheValidityOfTheEntry(String[] orderDetails_trimmed)
        Check if order entry in orders file (input) is valid
        Parameters:
        orderDetails_trimmed - - String array of order details split by whitespace into orderID, deliveryLocation, orderPlaceTime
        Returns:
        A boolean data type.

      • getCustOrderDetails

        public ArrayList<OrderDetails> getCustOrderDetails()
        Retrieve the custOrderDetails List
        Returns:
        An ArrayList.

      • getSortedTripOrderDetails

        public ArrayList<OrderDetails> getSortedTripOrderDetails()
        Retrieve sorted sortedTripOrderDetails list.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList.
